name: Legend of the Game
description:
General:

Little project I'm working on.  I still don't really know a good name for the game. Also I have zero experience in gamedevelopment, so I love some feedback to improve. 

Discord: Just_Bram#9218 Story: The player woke up and saw that all his stuff went missing and now he has to buy his way out.  He wants to becoma a pirate legend so he has to make his way to the tavern where they are recruiting fresh meat. Controls:
  • movement: arrows
  • Menu: S
  • Interaction: E
  • Inventory: I
  • Skip dialog: spacebar
